title: The Java Source Attachment Preference Page has excessive white space
OB: The Java Source Attachment Preference Page has a label that is vertically aligned in the middle of the page, creating excessive white space. The vertical alignment of the label should be set to SWT.ALIGN_BEGINNING.
EB: The label should be aligned at the top similar to other elements on the page.
SR: Adjust the vertical alignment of the label on the Java Source Attachment Preference Page to SWT.ALIGN_BEGINNING.
